    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public javafx.scene.Parent createGame()
        Creates a game scene, setting up canvas, character, and projectiles.
        Returns:
        root, which contains all of the items to make the scene and start the game

      • createMenu

        public javafx.scene.Parent createMenu()
        Creates a menu scene, with the play and instruction buttons that lead to new scenes.
        Returns:
        root, which contains the items that create the menu scene

      • createInstructions

        public javafx.scene.Parent createInstructions()
        Creates an instructions scene, with a play button that starts a the game
        Returns:
        root, which contains the items that create the instructions scene

      • addProjectiles

        public void addProjectiles(int u)
        Creates projectile objects only when the game has started
        Parameters:
        u - number of frames that passed

      • updateProjectiles

        public void updateProjectiles(javafx.animation.AnimationTimer timer)
        Updates location of projectiles, and whether collisions have occurred.
        Parameters:
        timer - is the timer that starts at the beginning of the game

        Updates the state of the character based on buttons pressed.
